@template public
{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container | ng-app | ng-controller=MachinePricingController}}

@col 12

h1. Pricing


{{html:
<br>
<ul class="nav nav-tabs tabOfPrice">
  <li class="active"><a href="#CloudSpace" data-toggle="tab">Cloud Space</a></li>
  <li><a href="#MachineDeck" data-toggle="tab">Machine Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#StorageDeck" data-toggle="tab">Storage Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#DesktopDeck" data-toggle="tab">Desktop Deck</a></li>
  <li><a href="#ApplicationDeck" data-toggle="tab">Application Deck</a></li>
  
</ul>


<div class="tab-content">
  <div class="minCloud tab-pane fade in active" id="CloudSpace">
      <div class="col-md-12 mB15">
        <div class="row operationWrap">
            <div class="btn-group btn-group-sm priceHM floatR">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'hr'">Hourly</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'mo'">Monthly</button>
            </div>
        </div>
   </div>


}}
{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
    {{div4: class=cnrflash }}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">Plane 1</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>0</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>First Cloud Space with Port Forwarding</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Private Defense Shield</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Public IPv4</td></tr>
                    
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice center">Plane 2</h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>0</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>Extra Cloud Space with Port forwarding</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>+ Public IPv4</td></tr>
                    
                    
                    
                    
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}

            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}

    {{div2}}
    {{div2: class=col-md-3}}

        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}



{{div}}

{{html:

  </div>

  <div class="tab-pane fade in" id="MachineDeck">
  <div class="col-md-12 mB15">
        <div class="row operationWrap">
            <label class="col-sm-2 control-label">Operation System: </label>
            <div class="col-md-3">
                <select name="country" class="form-control">
                    <option value="">Linux</option>
                    <option value="">Windows</option>
                </select>
            </div>
            <div class="btn-group btn-group-sm priceHM floatR">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'hr'">Hourly</button>
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" ng-model="pricingModel" btn-radio="'mo'">Monthly</button>
            </div>
        </div>
      </div>
  
}}
{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-xs-12 col-md-2 | ng-repeat=plan in linuxPlans}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=cnrflash | ng-show=plan.recommended}}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice"> {[plan.name]} </h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>/{[pricingModel]}</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>{[plan.mem]} Memory</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.cores]} 
                        <ng-pluralize count="plan.cores" when="{'one': 'Core', 'other': 'Cores'}">
                    </td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.primary]}GB SSD Storage<br>Scale to 100GB</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Snapshots</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Backup</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Firewall & VPN</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Unlimited Transfer*</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}



{{div}}

{{html:


<table class="techspecs">
    <tr>
        <th  class="title">All Plans Include:</th>

        <td class="column-divider"></td>
        <td class="full-span full-span2">
            <ul>
                <li>Cloud Space with defense shield</li>
                <li>Choice of standard Linux and Windows templates</li>
                <li>All functions as described in the Machine Deck</li>
                <li class="motherShipSub">Disaster Recovery Backup (managed by Mothership<sup>1</sup>)</li>
                <li>Monitoring by Mothership Operations</li>
                <li>99.99% Uptime SLA</li>
            </ul>

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>


    </tr>


</table>


}}
(*) Unlimited Transfer is subject to fair use policy as descibed in the FAQ section

<div class="table-responsive">
    <table class="table table-hover pricingTable">
      
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th width="40%">Request Pricing</th>
          <th width="20%">USD/GB/month</th>
          <th>USD/GB/hour</th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        <tr>
          <td>
            PUT, COPY, POST, or LIST Requests
          </td>
          <td>Free</td>
          <td></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            Delete Requests
          </td>
          <td>Free</td>
          <td></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            GET and all other Requests first 10,000 requests
          </td>
          <td>Free</td>
          <td></td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            GET and all other Requests next 10,000 requests
          </td>
          <td>$0.004 </td>
          <td>per 10,000 requests</td>
        </tr>
        
      </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>
  <div class="table-responsive">
